high_descs: Turn around and walk to the dresser with the TV on it.
Pick up the remote control from the dresser.
Walk to the floor lamp on your left.
Turn the floor lamp on.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up the remote control, turn on the floor lamp.

high_descs: Move to the left side of the TV stand where the remote is on top of the TV stand
Pick up the remote on top of the TV stand
Turn around, move to the large floor lamp
Turn on the lamp
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn left, proceed to dresser holding television.
Remove remote control from underneath television.
Turn left, proceed to wall, turn right to face floor lamp.
Turn lamp in front of you on.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up remote and turn lamp on.

high_descs: Turn and go to the right side of the couch facing the couch.
Pick up the pillow that is on the right side..
With the pillow in hand turn right and go forward to the chair.
Put the pillow on the left side of the chair standing up on it's side.
Turn back around and go to where the pillow is on the couch.
Pick up the pillow that is in the middle of the couch.
With the pillow in hand turn to your left and go to the chair where the pillow is.
Place the pillow in your hand on the right side of the chair standing up.
tasks.task_desc: Move pillows to the chair.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the coffee table, then turn right and walk to the couch.
Pick up the pillow on the right side of the couch.
Turn to the left and walk to the chair across the room.
Place the pillow on the chair.
Turn to the right and walk to the middle of the couch, then turn left to face it.
Pick up the pillow on the chair.
Turn left and walk to the chair across the room.
Place the pillow on the chair to the right of the other pillow.
tasks.task_desc: To move the pillows to the chair.

high_descs: Head forward, take a left at the couch, then take right to face the couch
Pick up the red credit card that is sitting on the couch to the right of the computer
Turn right and head to the TV stand, at the TV stand take a left and walk to the tall floor lamp, turn to face the lamp
Lift the credit card up to the lamp and then turn on the floor lamp
tasks.task_desc: Examine a credit card under a lamp

high_descs: walk forward towards the couch and turn left. walk forward a little and then turn towards the couch
pick up the credit card from the couch
turn right and walk towards the wall. make a left at the lamp and then face the lamp
raise the credit card and turn on the lamp
tasks.task_desc: look at the credit card under a lit lamp

high_descs: Go straight and then left when you reach the couch, to the center of the couch.
Pick up the red credit card on the couch.
Turn right and walk straight and then left to the floor lamp in the corner.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Look at a credit card by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Turn around, walk past the table, then turn left to face the sofa.
Pick up the credit card on the sofa.
Turn around, walk passed the table, turn right, and look at the box on the table.
Place the card in the box.
Pick up the box from the table.
Head towards the long sofa on your right.
Place the box with the credit card to the left of the pillow on the sofa.
tasks.task_desc: Place the box with the credit card to the left of the pillow on the sofa.

high_descs: Walk to the chair behind you
Grab the red card off of the chair
WAlk to the coffee table behind you
Place the card in the card board box
Pick up the card board box
Walk to the sofa to your right
Place the card board box on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the card in the box, place it on the sofa

high_descs: Turn around and go to the far chair on the left side.
Take the credit card from the chair cushion.
Turn around and go to the far end of the coffee table.
Place the credit card in the box on the coffee table.
Pick up the box from the coffee table.
Turn right, go to the left side of the couch.
Put the box on the left couch cushion.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with a credit card in it on a couch cushion.

high_descs: Turn to the right and then the left to go around the coffee table. Face the couch on the right.
Pick up the box from the couch.
Take the box and turn to the chair on the left.
Place the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move a box from the couch to the chair.

high_descs: Turn right, turn left, walk to couch, turn left, walk to end of couch near chairs, turn right to face couch.
Pick up the box from the couch.
Turn left, walk to table, turn right, walk to chair.
Put the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box on the right hand chair.

high_descs: Move across the room to the left side of the largest tan sofa
Pick up the empty box on top of the sofa
Carry the empty box to the tan chair on the right
Place the empty box on top of the chair
tasks.task_desc: Move an empty box to the chair

high_descs: walk forward, turn left, walk a few steps, turn left to face the brown table
pick up the box that is on the table
turn right, walk forward to the chair
put the box on the chair
tasks.task_desc: move a box from the table to the chair

high_descs: Move to the black square coffee table where the empty box is sitting
Pick up the empty box sitting on the coffee table
Carry the empty box to face the tan chair on the right
Place the empty box on top of the chair
tasks.task_desc: Move an empty box to the chair

high_descs: go forward to the end of the sofa and turn to the left and go forward to the end of the coffee table and turn to the left
pick up the box from the coffee table
turn to the right and go forward to the chair
place the box on the chair
tasks.task_desc: place a box on a chair

high_descs: Turn left and go around the black coffee table to the other side.
Pick up the gray remote from the table.
Turn around and go to the arm chair on the right.
Place the remote on the seat on the left of the red credit card.
Turn around and go to the front of the sofa.
Pick up the gray remote on the sofa seat.
Turn left and go back to front of the arm chair on the right.
Place the remote on the left of the first remote on the seat.
tasks.task_desc: Move the remotes to the arm chair seat.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the black coffee table between it and the sofa.
Pick p the gray remote on table towards the front.
Turn right an go to the arm chair on the right.
Place the remote on the seat of the chair.
Turn around and go to the far side of the coffee table.
Pick up the remote on the table near the edge.
Turn right and go back to the front of the arm chair with a remote on the seat.
Place the remote on the left of the first remote on the seat.
tasks.task_desc: Move the remotes from the table to the arm chair seat.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the side of the coffee table with the keys on top.
Pick up the keys from the table.
Go around the coffee table to the front of the sofa with a remote on the seat.
Place the keys on the top of the middle of the seats near the front edge.
tasks.task_desc: Move the keys from the table to the sofa

high_descs: Turn around, go forward a bit, turn right, go forward, turn left,go forward, turn left in front of the coffee table
Pick up the keys on the coffee table
Turn right, go forward a bit, turn left, go forward, turn right in front of the couch
Put the keys in the middle of couch
tasks.task_desc: Bring the keys to the couch

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room to face the end of the black table where the keys are.
Pick they keys up from the table.
Go right and then left and then turn to face the couch.
Put the keys down on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys on the couch.

high_descs: Turn around, step to the right and move forward. Make a left and face the coffee table.
Pick up the keys from the coffee table.
Turn around completely and go forward to the couch.
Set the keys on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Move keys to a couch.

high_descs: Move left to face the black square coffee table
Pick up the keys on the coffee table
Carry the keys to the left side of the large tan sofa
Place the keys in the middle of the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Move keys to the sofa

high_descs: turn around and walk to the coffee table. turn left.
pick up the keys from the table
turn around to the couch
place the keys on the couch
tasks.task_desc: move the keys from the coffee table to the couch

high_descs: Turn around and turn left between the couch and the coffee table, then go to the chair across from you.
Pick up the keys from the cushion of the chair.
Turn around and walk back through the couch and the coffee table to get to the entertainment stand the TV is on.
Place the keys on the entertainment stand, underneath the TV.
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the TV stand.

high_descs: Turn around, walk a few steps, hanging a left before you reach the couch, and walk straight across the room to the chair.
Pick up the set of keys that are on the chair.
Turn around, walk until you reach the end of the couch, turn right, then left to face the television stand.
Place the keys down on the television stand.
tasks.task_desc: Move a set of keys to the television stand.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the couch then turn left and walk to the arm chair.
Pick up the keys that are in front of you.
Turn around and walk to the tv and stand right in the middle of it facing it.
Put the keys under the right side of the tv's base.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys on the tv stand.

high_descs: Turn around and take one step, then turn right and take two steps, then turn right to face the coffee table.
Pick up the keys that are closest to the box on the table.
Turn to the right and take one step, then turn left and walk to the end of the coffee table, then turn left and take one step, then turn right.
Place the keys on the table.
tasks.task_desc: To move the keys.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the left side of the coffee table.
Pick up the keys closest to the box.
Walk around the coffee table and ahead to the TV stand.
Place the keys on the TV stand, in front of the leftmost watch.
tasks.task_desc: Place a set of keys on a TV stand.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the lamp table, turn right and walk to the coffee table.
Pick up the keys.
Walk around the coffee table to the counter.
Put the keys on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the counter.

high_descs: Walk to the front of the white sofa.
Grab the right set of keys from the sofa.
Walk behind you to the TV stand.
Put the keys on the TV stand.
tasks.task_desc: Move keys from the sofa to the TV stand.

high_descs: take one step, turn left, take two steps, turn right to face the couch
pick up the keys that are on the couch
turn right, take a step, turn right, take a few steps, turn left, walk to TV stand
put the keys on the TV stand
tasks.task_desc: move keys from couch to TV stand

high_descs: Go to the couch in front of you.
Pick up the keys on the right side of the couch, closest to the throw pillow.
Turn around and go to the front of the dresser the TV is on.
Put the keys on the dresser, under the TV.
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the dresser.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the coffee table on the left
Grab the watch on the coffee table
Turn around, walk to the corner with a floor lamp
Turn on the floor lamp
tasks.task_desc: Grab the watch on the coffee table, turn on the floor lamp in the corner

high_descs: Turn around and go forward.  At the brown coffee table turn and face it.
Grab the watch that is on the coffee table.
With the watch in your hand go to the floor lamp that is in the corner.
While holding the watch turn the lamp on with your other hand.
tasks.task_desc: Get watch to turn lamp on.

high_descs: Turn around and then turn left to locate the coffee table.
Pick up the watch from the table.
Turn around, and go to the right to find the lamp in the corner of the room.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Find the watch and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Move to go face the round black table on the left of the leftmost chair.
Pick up the red credit card that's on the table behind the lamp.
Bring the credit card with you and face the chair that's just to the right of the table you picked it up from.
Put the credit card down on the seat of the chair.
Turn around and face the coffee table so that the remote control is in front of the golden statue when you look at it.
Pick up the credit card from the center of the coffee table.
Bring the credit card back to the same chair that you left the other one on.
Put the credit card down on the seat to the right of the first one.
tasks.task_desc: move the credit cards to the chair.

high_descs: Turn left, go to the side of the coffee table, turn right to face the coffee table.
Take the keys from the coffee table.
Turn around and face the seat on the left.
Put the keys on the seat cushion.
Turn left, go to the round black table next to the seat.
Take the keys from the table.
Go to the seat next to the round black table.
Put the keys on the seat cushion to the right of the other keys.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys on a seat's cushion.

high_descs: Go around the coffee table to face the other side of it.
Pick the keys up off of the coffee table.
Turn to the left to face the armchair.
Place the keys on top of the armchair.
Move to the left to face the side table.
Pick the keys up off of the side table.
Turn around and face the armchair to the left.
Place the keys next to the other set of keys on the armchair.
tasks.task_desc: Place both sets of keys on top of the armchair.

high_descs: Turn left, hang a left at the couch and walk to the square coffee table on the left.
Pick up the remote control from the middle of the table.
Turn left, hang a right at the end of the couch and walk to the dresser with a television on the left.
Put the remote control on the right side of the dresser in front of the television.
tasks.task_desc: Place a remote on a dresser.

high_descs: Turn to the left, walk up to the couch, then turn left, then left again to face the table.
Pick up the remote control that is to the left of the other remote on the table.
Turn to the left, walk forward, then turn right at the end of the table, then left and walk up to the television stand.
Place the remote control down on the television stand.
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote control to the television stand.

high_descs: Walk over to the black coffee table.
Pick up the remote on the left.
Walk to the front of the TV stand.
Put the remote down on the TV stand to the right.
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote from the coffee table to the TV stand.

high_descs: Go across the room and turn left between the black cabinet and the coffee table, then turn to the end of the coffee table on your left.
Pick up the remote on the front, left corner of the table.
Turn around and go to the black cabinet the TV is on.
Place the remote on the black cabinet, in front of the TV.
tasks.task_desc: Put the remote in front of the TV.

high_descs: Turn and go to the side of the coffee table. The side where the tv is.
Pick up the tv remote that is on the coffee table in front of you on the left corner.
With the remote in hand turn all the way around to the tv directly behind you.
Place the remote on the tv stand in the front and to the right of the tv.
tasks.task_desc: Move the tv remote to tv stand.

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards the coffee table in the middle of the room.
Pick up the remote control on the left corner of the table.
Turn around and face the TV opposite the coffee table.
Put the remote control on the TV stand next to the TV on the right.
tasks.task_desc: Move the remote control from the coffee table to the TV stand.

high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the chair that is to the left of the chair you are standing in front of.
Pick up the credit card that is on the chair.
With the credit card in your hand turn and go to the coffee table on the side where the gold statue is.
Place the credit card to the left of the gold statue on the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Move the credit card to the coffee table.

high_descs: Walk up to the chair in front of you, then hang a left and walk towards the door, turn right and walk up to the chair with a red credit card on its seat.
Pick up the red credit card off of the chair.
Walk over to the black coffee table behind you.
Put the red credit card on the coffee table next to the golden statue.
tasks.task_desc: Move a red credit card to the coffee table.

high_descs: Turn and go left to face the chair on the left.
Pick the credit card up from the chair.
Turn around and face the black table.
Put the credit card down on the black table.
tasks.task_desc: Put a credit card down on a table.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the cabinet the tv's on then move to your right until you face the laptop to the right of the tv.
Pick up the credit card that's in front of you under the laptop.
Turn around and walk to the small black coffee table.
Put the credit card on the black coffee table near the statue.
tasks.task_desc: Put a credit card on the table.

high_descs: Turn and go to the dresser that the tv is on and go in front of the lap top.
Pick up the credit card that is in front of the lap top.
While holding the credit card turn and go to the coffee table on the side with the gold statue.
Place the credit card to the left of the gold statue.
tasks.task_desc: Move credit card to coffee table.

high_descs: Move to the right side of the black TV stand where the credit card is
Pick up the red credit card on top of the TV stand
Carry the credit card over to the square black coffee table
place the credit card on top of the coffee table to the left of the gold statue
tasks.task_desc: Move a credit card to the coffee table

high_descs: cross the room and turn right and go to the coffee table
pick up the watch sitting on the coffee table
turn around and cross the room to the end table beside the couch
place the watch on the table in front of the light
turn around and cross the room back to the coffee table
pick up the watch on the coffee table
cross the room back to the end table
place the watch on the table beside the other watch
tasks.task_desc: pick up both watches and move to the end table

high_descs: go to the coffee table with the computer on it
pick up the watch sitting by the computer on the coffee table
go to the end table with the light on it
set the watch on the table
go back to the coffee table
pick up the other watch on the coffee table
go back to the end table
set the watch down with the other watch
tasks.task_desc: move both watches to the end table

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the round table that is on the left of the chair then turn left and face the wall
Pick up the watering can that is sitting below the table
Turn left and walk toward the chair across the room, then turn left, then right at the coffee table and walk to the tv stand
Open the far right cabinet on the tv stand and lay the watering can on its side inside the cabinet then close the cabinet
tasks.task_desc: Place a watering can in a cabinet

high_descs: Turn around and face left to reach the black round table next to the couch.
Pick up the tea kettle from under the round table on the floor.
Turn left and walk to the front of the television stand on the left.
Open the lower right cabinet, put the tea kettle inside and close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Place a tea kettle in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn around completely, walk up to the round black table, then look underneath it.
Pick up the watering can that is on the floor, underneath the table.
Turn to the left, walk almost to the chair, turn left, walk a few steps, then turn right to face the entertainment center.
Place the watering can in the far right cabinet of the entertainment center and close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Place a watering can in a cabinet of the entertainment center.

high_descs: turn around and walk forwards to the end of the room, then turn right and walk to the end of the room with the black circle table
grab the credit card off of the black table
turn around and walk forwards a bit, then turn left and walk until you reach the left white chair of the two white chairs, turn to face the chair
place the credit card down inside the box on top of the white chair
pick up the box off of the chair
turn around and walk over to couch on the left side of the room
place the cardboard box down on top of the couch
tasks.task_desc: place a box with a credit card in it on top of the couch

high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the door, then hang a right and walk up to the small round black table with a lamp on it.
Pick up the red credit card on the small round back table.
Turn around and walk forward, then turn left and walk to the front of the chair with a cardboard box on the seat.
Put the red credit card into the cardboard box.
Pick up the cardboard box with the red credit card in it.
Turn around and take a step forward, then turn left and walk around the black coffee table over to the couch.
Place the cardboard box with a red credit card in it onto the left couch cushion.
tasks.task_desc: Place a cardboard box with a red credit card in it on the couch.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the corner with end table
Grab the credit card on the table
Turn around, and turn left to the sofa,
Put the credit card in the box on the sofa
Take the whole box with card in it
Turn around, walk to the sofa with white pillow on it
Put the box down on the sofa by the white pillow
tasks.task_desc: Put the credit card in the box, move the box to the sofa with white pillow

high_descs: Turn right and walk over to the chair, then hang a left and walk towards the door, turn right and walk up to the round black table in the corner of the room.
Pick up the water can off of the ground below the round black table.
Turn left ad walk towards the chair in the corner of the room, then hang a left and walk forward, turn right and walk over to the dresser the television is on.
Open the rightmost cabinet door of the dresser and put the watering can inside, then close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Move a watering can into a dresser cabinet.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the chair then turn left and walk to the wall then turn right and walk to the table then turn left.
Pick up the watering can that's in front of you on the floor by the wall.
Turn left and walk to the tv that's in front of you to your left and stand facing the right side of the tv.
Open the cupboard all the way to the right of the tv stand and put the watering can down there then close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Put a watering can in the cupboard.

high_descs: Go right and then left and turn to the right to face the small black table in the corner.
Pick the white pitcher up from the floor by the black table.
Turn left and cross the room to face the black cabinet with the television on it.
Open the cabinet on the bottom right and put the pitcher in and shut the door.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pitcher in a cabinet.
